trans-unit.source: Triggers the compensation of a completed child <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that implements the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ICompensatableActivity" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Dispara a compensação de um filho concluído <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que implementa a interface <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ICompensatableActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> that implements <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ICompensatableActivity> is compensateable.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> que implementa <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ICompensatableActivity> é compensateable.

trans-unit.source: A compensatable activity is a valid target of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity>, as long as that activity is a child <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Uma atividade compensável é um destino válido de uma <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity>, enquanto que a atividade é um filho <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Compensation SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é do exemplo de compensação SDK.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Compensation Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [exemplo de compensação](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b).

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atividade definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que gerencie o evento.

trans-unit.source: The previously typed event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos do evento com tipo anterior.

trans-unit.source: Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Define o procedimento de processamento quando o evento assinado ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> to compensate.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> a compensar.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> to compensate.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> para compensar.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates accessing the `TargetActivityName` property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o acesso a `TargetActivityName` propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This sample is from the Compensation SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é da amostra do SDK de compensação.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Compensation Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [exemplo de compensação](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity.TargetActivityName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que tem como destino a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensateActivity.TargetActivityName" />.
